name: ASTRONEER
description: A game of aerospace industry and interplanetary exploration.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only) Processor: X64 Dual Core CPU, 2+ GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 1 GB Ram DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online multiplayer
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit only), Windows 8 (64 bit only), Windows 10 (64 bit only) Processor: X64 Quad Core CPU, 3+ GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete Non Mobile GPU with 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Any
